description: All documents related to Your applications for the two GS-15 supervisory positions advertised on June 23, 2023 and July 7, 2023.
All documents supporting Your claim regarding the Knoxville Field Office Federal Land Law Specialist position and the January 10, 2017 policy.
All medical documentation submitted to the Agency in support of reasonable accommodation requests from January 2020 to the present.
All emails, memoranda, and communications between You and Regional Solicitor Goessling from January 1, 2024 through October 10, 2024.
All emails, memoranda, and communications between You and supervisor Cortelyou-Hamilton from January 1, 2024 through October 10, 2024.
All time and attendance records for calendar years 2023 and 2024.
All documents related to Your PB 18-01 complaint(s) filed in 2024.
All prior EEO complaints, counseling reports, and settlements from Your employment with the Agency.
All performance evaluations and performance-related documents from Your employment with the Agency.
All laudatory emails, commendations, or recognition received during fiscal years 2022, 2023, and 2024.
All documents evidencing Your workload during fiscal years 2022, 2023, and 2024.
All documents related to Your compensatory time request for work performed during bereavement leave in June 2024.
All documents related to the site visit denial referenced in Issue 2(m).
All documents related to Your requests to facilitate seminars for the Chief Justice's Commission on Professionalism.
All documents related to the BUIS opinion referenced in Issue 2(q).
All medical records or bills evidencing treatment You contend was caused or exacerbated by the alleged conduct.
All documents related to the MSPB substitution of counsel request referenced in Issue 3(a).
All communications regarding Your medical records from August 2020 to the present.
All documents related to the Touhy assignment referenced in Issue 2(u).
All documents You intend to introduce as evidence in this matter.
